players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie, it was a mistake. I'm just a villager. I think Diana might be the mafia."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. He knows I'm the detective, yet he claims innocence. That makes him a liar. I vote to arrest Bob."
You: "I trust Diana's investigation. Bob, you are the mafia. Vote to arrest you."
You: "I think Diana is the mafia. She lied about Bob, who is a villager. Vote for Diana."
Diana: "Bob is mafia. I investigated him and confirmed. Alice, you trust my investigation but also accuse me of being mafia—contradiction. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. I was just a villager. I think Alice is the mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I didn't kill Charlie, it was a mistake. I'm just a villager. I think Diana might be the mafia."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. He knows I'm the detective, yet he claims innocence. That makes him a liar. I vote to arrest Bob."
Alice: "I trust Diana's investigation. Bob, you are the mafia. Vote to arrest you."
Alice: "I think Diana is the mafia. She lied about Bob, who is a villager. Vote for Diana."
Diana: "Bob is mafia. I investigated him and confirmed. Alice, you trust my investigation but also accuse me of being mafia—contradiction. Vote Bob."
You: "I didn't kill Charlie. I was just a villager. I think Alice is the mafia."

Alice: "I think Diana is the mafia. She lied about Bob, who is a villager. Vote for Diana."
You: "Bob is mafia. I investigated him and confirmed. Alice, you trust my investigation but also accuse me of being mafia—contradiction. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. I was just a villager. I think Alice is the mafia."
